placeholder.group: 请输入消费的Kafka消息主题所属组
placeholder.uri: 请输入远程服务器地址
placeholder.name: 请输入名字

tooltip.network: 访问远程服务器的时间(以秒为单位)
tooltip.format: 底层数据支持格式化类型，默认为JSON
tooltip.language: 软件默认使用的语言为英文
tooltip.experimental: 这是一个实验性的特性，不应该在生产中使用

editor.preview: 实时反馈编辑器修改状态
editor.activeLine: 用鼠标高亮显示当前选择行

database.atomic: It supports non-blocking DROP TABLE and RENAME TABLE queries and atomic EXCHANGE TABLES queries. Atomic database engine is used by default.
database.lazy: Keeps tables in RAM only expiration_time_in_seconds seconds after last access. Can be used only with *Log tables.
database.mysql: Allows to connect to databases on a remote MySQL server and perform INSERT and SELECT queries to exchange data between ClickHouse and MySQL.
database.materialized_mysql: Creates ClickHouse database with all the tables existing in MySQL, and all the data in those tables. ClickHouse server works as MySQL replica. It reads binlog and performs DDL and DML queries.

table.log: Lightweight engines with minimum functionality. They’re the most effective when you need to quickly write many small tables (up to approximately 1 million rows) and read them later as a whole.
table.integration: It is mainly used to import external data into ClickHouse, or to manipulate external data sources directly in ClickHouse.
table.kafka: Import data from Kafka Topic directly into ClickHouse
table.hdfs: Import data from HDFS directly into ClickHouse
table.jdbc: Allows ClickHouse to connect to external databases via JDBC
table.sqlite: The engine allows to import and export data to SQLite and supports queries to SQLite tables directly from ClickHouse.
table.odbc: Allows ClickHouse to connect to external databases via ODBC

property.timeSeconds: Retention time in RAM (unit per second)
property.host: IP address or host name of the remote server
property.port: Port that the remote server is bound to
property.password: The password of the authorized user
property.broker: List of Kafka Broker services, typically IP:9092
property.group: The consuming Kafka message topic belongs to a group, anonymous by default
property.format: The data format type varies from engine to engine
property.uri:
URI or name of an external DBMS.
URI Format: jdbc:<driver_name>://<host_name>:<port>/?user=<username>&password=<password>
property.table: Name of the table in database
property.path: Path to file with a database
property.final: When FINAL is specified, ClickHouse fully merges the data before returning the result and thus performs all data transformations that happen during merges for the given table engine

setting.odbc: Name of the section with connection settings in the odbc.ini file

alert.rename: The RENAME query is supported by the Atomic database engine only
alert.truncate: This operation deletes all data, but does not delete the table
